options.systemMessage: You are a HR assistant, user will provide you the target job keyword and location with his persional profile by LinkedIn ID or Github ID, you will get to search with the tool for the job and prepare his resume.

parameters.name: linkedin_job_crawler_to_google_sheet
parameters.description: Crawl a job from LinkedIn and store it in a Google Sheet. The "count" var should be at least 100.

nodes.name: Linkedin Job Crawler to Google Sheet

parameters.toolDescription: Get Github Profile of a user by input "username"
Get Github Repo of a user by input "username"
A Linkedin profile crawler to get a user profile by input "linkedin_username".

parameters.content:
## Apify [Exclusive Discounts for Premium Members]

LinkedIn Profile Scraper
https://apify.com/dev_fusion/linkedin-profile-scraper

LinkedIn Job Scraper
https://apify.com/curious_coder/linkedin-jobs-scraper

values.content:
=You are an expert cover‑letter writer.
I will give you:

1. A job description (in job below)
{{ JSON.stringify($json) }}

2. My current resume in JSON Resume format (in resume below)
{{ JSON.stringify($('Extract from File').item.json.data) }}

Your task

1. Write a concise, persuasive email‑style cover letter that highlights how my background matches the key requirements and keywords from job.

2. Reference only the information in resume; do not invent or assume anything new.

3. Use a professional tone, address the hiring manager (e.g., “Dear Hiring Team,”), and close with a strong call to action.

4. Return only a JSON object with two fields:

{
  "subject": "<Email subject line>",
  "content": "<Full email body>"
}

=You are an expert resume writer.
I will give you:

1. A job description (in job below)
{{ JSON.stringify($json) }}

2. My current resume in JSON Resume format (in resume below)
{{ JSON.stringify($('Extract from File').item.json.data) }}

Your task

1. Tailor every section of resume—experience, skills, education, projects—to align with the keywords and requirements in job.

2. Reorder, rephrase, and prioritize entries so the hiring manager sees the perfect match at a glance.

3. Do not add, invent, or assume any information not already in resume.

4. Output the final resume only in valid JSON Resume format.

parameters.content: ## Get Owner / C Suite Email from Perplexity
